    {exploratorium}

    Overview

    An attractive and playful platform for citizens and the federal government to explore the projects supported in the promotion of diseases in Switzerland.

    Access to the app

    The app is deployed on shinyapps.io.

    The prod app: prod version

    The dev app (only for the dev team and key business users): dev version

    Documentation

    The technical documentation for the developers is available in the pkgdown. You will find global information about:

    • The architecture of the app
    • How to update and modify the data used by the app
    • How to manually deploy the app on shinyapps.io
